plugins.name: azure-devops
plugins.description: Plugin for interacting with Azure DevOps

plugins.name: copilot
plugins.description: Skills for working with GitHub Copilot

plugins.name: ghostty
plugins.description: Ghostty automation for windows, tabs, splits, focus, and input on macOS.

plugins.name: chrome-devtools
plugins.description: Give your AI coding assistant access to the full power of Chrome DevTools for reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis.

plugins.name: playwright-ext
plugins.description: Browser automation and end-to-end testing MCP server by Microsoft. Enables Claude to interact with web pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and perform automated browser testing workflows.

plugins.name: tmux
plugins.description: Remote control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs (python, gdb, etc.) by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output.

plugins.name: codespaces
plugins.description: Connect to and interact with GitHub Codespaces via gh ado-codespaces and gh cs ssh. Manages persistent connections with port forwarding and Azure auth, runs commands and Copilot CLI remotely, and supports multiple codespaces.

plugins.name: ollama
plugins.description: Generate images from text prompts using Ollama's local image generation models.

plugins.name: worktrunk
plugins.description: Disk-aware Worktrunk (wt) workflows for parallel agent worktrees and independently committable chunks.
